name: Dungeon Tales: An RPG Deck Building Card Game
name_original: Dungeon Tales: An RPG Deck Building Card Game
description:
Dungeon Tales is a turn-based roguelike RPG card game.

Fight against epic monsters to collect cards and relics. Plan your strategy and build your deck as you progress through the adventure.

Choose your path from procedurally generated dungeons, and decide the best route to victory. Visit shops to extend your arsenal, find treasures, encounter curious events and choose how to react. Master your deck building with unique strategy and endless combos.

- Deck building card game with a fusion of roguelike RPG elements
- Unique turn-based fight system that you haven't seen in any card game before
- Epic boss battles which award usage of adaptive strategy
- Procedural map system
- Shops, campfires, and traps
- Unique events to spice up the adventure
- Collect 50+ cards for deck building
- Collect 60+ relics
- Slay 50+ monsters
- Slay 9 elite monsters
- Slay 10 epic bosses
- Countless combinations
